snippet: Ippodo Tea, a Japanese company based in Kyoto, serves green teas in Murray Hill, including matcha, which is gaining a wider following in the United States.
abstract: Neighboorhood Joint column on Ippodo Tea Company in Murray Hill section of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Ippodo Tea, a Japanese company based in Kyoto, serves green teas in Murray Hill, including matcha, which is gaining a wider following in the United States.

headline.main: Where Starbucks Meets Matcha: Ippodo Tea in Murray Hill
